00036 #include "contiki-stk501.h"
00037 
00038 #if UIP_CONF_IPV6
00039 #warning ********Explcit IPV4 code bypassed***********
00040 #else
00041 
00042 static struct uip_fw_netif slipif =
00043   {UIP_FW_NETIF(10,100,0,0, 255,255,0,0, slip_send)};
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 void
00047 init_net(void)
00048 {
00049 #if !UIP_CONF_IPV6
00050   uip_ipaddr_t hostaddr;
00051 
00052   rs232_set_input (SLIP_PORT, slip_input_byte); 
00053   process_start(&slip_process, NULL);
00054 
00055   uip_ipaddr(&hostaddr, 10, 100, 0, 2);
00056   uip_sethostaddr(&hostaddr);
00057 
00058   uip_fw_register(&slipif);
00059   // uip_fw_default(&slipif);
00060 #endif /* UIP_CONF_IPV6 */
00061 }
